description:
WISE agents protect an opera singer and Henderson gives Anya tips on becoming an Imperial Scholar.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Behind the Scandal / The Path to an Imperial Scholar
Detrás del escándalo / El camino para ser Escolar Imperial
Scandal no Uragawa / Imperial Scholar e no Michi
スキャンダルの裏側 / インペリアル・スカラーへの道
